title: PAUSE_MENU_SET_BUSY_SPINNER
content:
0xC78E239AC5B2DDB90x6C67131A// PauseMenuSetBusySpinner
void PAUSE_MENU_SET_BUSY_SPINNER(BOOL bVisible, int iColumnID, int iSpinnerIndex);Parameters:bVisible: Sets or removes this spinner.iColumnID: Location of this spinner (0 - 17). Indexes can be found in common:\data\ui\frontend.xml, PauseMenu\PersistentData\Spinner\Offsets. If bVisible is false, this will be ignored.iSpinnerIndex: Index of this spinner. Can have a maximum of three spinners at a time.Sets a loading icon in the pause menu.
codeBlocks:
